solution_line_template: If Jimmy has {jimmy_sheets} sheets, and Tommy has {tommy_more_than_jimmy} more sheets than Jimmy does, Tommy has {tommy_more_than_jimmy}+{jimmy_sheets} = <<{jimmy_sheets}+{tommy_more_than_jimmy}={tommy_sheets}>>{tommy_sheets} sheets.
When Ashton gives Jimmy {ashton_gives} sheets, his total number of sheets increases to {jimmy_sheets}+ {ashton_gives} = <<{jimmy_sheets}+{ashton_gives}={jimmy_new_sheets}>>{jimmy_new_sheets}
The number of sheets that Jimmy now have than Tommy is {jimmy_new_sheets}-{tommy_sheets} = <<{jimmy_new_sheets}-{tommy_sheets}={jimmy_more_than_tommy}>>{jimmy_more_than_tommy}
